actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to exclude from the jurisdiction of the Interstate Commerce Commission certain transportation of property used in agricultural or horticultural production, in connection with the transportation of exempt property.
short_title: Agricultural Transportation Improvement and Regulatory Reform Act of l979

summary.text: Agricultural Transportation Improvement and Regulatory Reform Act of 1979 - Excludes from the jurisdiction of the Interstate Commerce Commission the transportation of specified property used in agricultural or horticultural production. Permits the Commission to inspect and copy the motor vehicle transportation records of specified cooperative associations or federations of cooperative associations and any record relating to the tonnage of property transported by specified motor agricultural carriers.

titles.title: Agricultural Transportation Improvement and Regulatory Reform Act of l979

A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to exclude from the jurisdiction of the Interstate Commerce Commission certain transportation of property used in agricultural or horticultural production, in connection with the transportation of exempt property.
